Text: Thanks mate, ontime as always.. cant wait to see it =)
Thnxx Dude, U r getting to be the 1st one to upload some of my fav shows. although I watch this show for the Extreme comical nature of the inept (for the most part) Miners.

ta looks like scene is 12 hours away again :)
seesm to alternate

so why did you add alaska again in the naming

they dropped it 2 seasons ago

I added Alaska again because that's what the scene and even BALLISTIC (P2P) has done. I realised that even when a show changes its name, whatever the name originally was, they still keep it in the release title.

For the scene they have topsites that are archive sites (home to tons of old releases) and in order to keep everything organised you'd see something like:

Gold.Rush.Alaska.S01E01.HDTV.XviD-MOMENTUM
Gold.Rush.Alaska.S01E02.HDTV.XviD-MOMENTUM
Gold.Rush.Alaska.S01E03.HDTV.XviD-MOMENTUM

etc. Removing Gold Rush ruins the organisation and everything so it's just best to keep it intact.

Either way it doesn't change anything, the episode is the same.

For those looking for The Dirt/Pay Dirt
